text:
e="preserve">Stanley Kavetu is a Namibian student activist & lawyer. He served as Vice President of the Namibia National Students Organisation (NANSO) from 2015 - 2017. He is a current member of the Affirmative Repositioning Movement legal forum team.
Personal life.
Kavetu was born at Oromauua Village in Opuwo district. He completed high school at St Joseph RC High School and later read law at the University of Namibia where he served in the university's student union.
Youth Activism.
Kavetu serves in Affirmative Repositioning Movement 's Legal Forum through the Kadhila Amoomo legal firm which represents underprivileged Namibians, forming part of the youth movements legal representatives.
